naslov: OPATIJA OKOLICA-DOBREĆ!ZAPOČETA GRADNJA-KUĆA + KUĆICA ZA ODMOR!PREKRAS (prodaja)
opis: OPATIJA OKOLICA-DOBREĆ!!!ZAPOČETA GRADNJA - KUĆA + KUĆICA ZA ODMOR!!!PREKRASAN POGLED NA MORE!!! Prodaje se započeta gradnja na lijepoj i mirnoj lokaciji, sa lokacije se pruže prekrasan pogled na more i okolicu.Započeta gradnja je cestom udaljena od mora cca 5 km, dok je zračne linije od mora cca 1,5 km. Navedena započeta gradnja se sastoji od dva objekta, kuće za odmor i kućice prizemnice za odmor.Za veliku kuću je dobivena građevinska dozvola za kuću za odmor s bazenom ukupne površine 225 m2.Predviđena kuća ima suteren, prizemlje i kat.Po rasporedu ima konobu i trosobni stan s dnevnim boravkom, predviđene su tri kupaonice s wc-om, kao i terasa i krovna terasa.Mala kućica je prizemnica tlocrtne površine 65 m2, u naravi je predviđen apartman dvosoban s dnevnim boravkom.Za oba objekta je osiguran dovoljan broj parkirnih mjesta na vlastitoj okućnici. Cijena nekretnine se odnosi na objekte izgrađene u roch-bau fazi. Postoji mogućnost dogovora s izvođačem za završetak objekata po sistemu "ključ u ruke". PRILIKA!!!ODLIČNA NEKRETNINA ZA ODMOR U MIRU I TIŠINI, KAO I ZA TURIZAM, S PREKRASNIM POGLEDOM NA MORE!!! JEDINSTVENA NEKRETNINA NA TRŽIŠTU!!!NE PROPUSTITE!!! -Za sve dodatne informacije i dogovore slobodno kontaktirajte agenta! OPATIJA SURROUNDINGS-DOBREĆ!!!CONSTRUCTION STARTED - HOUSE + HOLIDAY HOUSE!!!BEAUTIFUL SEA VIEW!!! Construction started for sale in a beautiful and quiet location, the location offers a beautiful view of the sea and the surrounding area. The construction started is approximately 5 km away from the sea by road, while the crow flies from the sea approximately 1.5 km. The construction that has begun consists of two buildings, a holiday home and a single-storey holiday home. A building permit has been obtained for the large house for a holiday home with a swimming pool with a total area of ​​225 m2. The planned house has a basement, ground floor and first floor. According to the layout, it has a tavern and a three-room apartment with a living room, three bathrooms with a toilet are planned, as well as a terrace and a roof terrace. The small house is a single-storey house with a floor area of ​​65 m2, in fact a two-room apartment with a living room is planned. Both buildings have a sufficient number of parking spaces on their own plot. The price of the property refers to buildings built in the roch-bau phase. There is a possibility of an agreement with the contractor for the completion of the buildings according to the "turnkey" system. OPPORTUNITY!!! EXCELLENT PROPERTY FOR A HOLIDAY IN PEACE AND QUIET, AS WELL AS FOR TOURISM, WITH A BEAUTIFUL SEA VIEW!!! UNIQUE PROPERTY ON THE MARKET!!! DON'T MISS IT!!! -For any additional information and arrangements, feel free to contact the agent!
